title: Exploring the human nervous system

description: The advances being made in research into the workings of the human nervous system. The nervous system itself is described by means of animated drawings. Also indicates what is being done to understand memory and learning. Compares the nervous systems of the hydra and the earth worm with the complex human nervous system.
